About me.

>

Hi, I'm Aaron

I am a Junior Front-End Web Developer with strong knowledge in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript

I am passionate about programming and love using a mixture of inspritation and creativity for developing my websites. I strive to stand out when it comes to my work am constantly looking for ways to improve my craft. Although I am a Junior developer at the moment, I am confident with hard work and dedication I can become a successful web developer.

I am currently looking for the opportunity to showcase my talents, expand my knowledge, and gain valuable experience as a developer.
